profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with expertise in React Three Fiber and state management libraries. Passionate about VR/AR development and open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

Contributed to the development of state management libraries such as Jotai, Zustand, and Valtio.
